CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Bronze
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: bronze
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Bronze is a time-honored alloy, resulting from the fusion of Ind_Copper and tin. Its rich, reddish-brown hue and enduring strength have made bronze a cornerstone of art, architecture, and historical craftsmanship.
